snippet: Gov. Terry McAuliffe, a Democrat, on Monday ordered a review of what he called “extreme and punitive” state health rules that make it harder to operate abortion clinics.
abstract: Virginia Gov Terry McAuliffe orders review of what he calls 'extreme and punitive' state health rules that make it harder to operate abortion clinics, saying he will protect women's rights to make health decisions.
lead_paragraph: Gov. Terry McAuliffe, a Democrat, on Monday ordered a review of what he called “extreme and punitive” state health rules that make it harder to operate abortion clinics.

headline.main: Virginia: Governor Orders Review of Last Administration’s Abortion Rules
headline.print_headline: Virginia: Governor Orders Review of Last Administration’s Abortion Rules
